tip.redirect:
Please configure Strava to accept the following Authorization Callback Domain for authentication of your application:

__constructedURIToShow__

warns.no-acceesstoken: Missing Strava access token. Authorization has not been completed before node initialization.
warns.no-configuration: Missing Strava configuration or credentials. Authorization has not been completed before node initialization.

errors.no-credentials-ui: ERROR: Received query from UI without the needed credentials
errors.no-credentials: ERROR: no credentials - should never happen
errors.username-error: Error! Strava node has failed to fetch the authenticated user's name.
errors.acceesstoken-error: Error! Strava node has failed to fetch a valid access token.
errors.csrf-token-mismatch: CSRF token mismatch, possible cross-site request forgery attempt.
errors.no-code: The callback from Strava did not contain a required code
errors.unexpected-statuscode: Strava replied with the unexpected HTTP status code of __statusCode__

messages.authorized: <html><head></head><body>Successfully authorized with Strava. You can close this window now.</body></html>
